data.message: how to get the Blue pin ? we had the choice in the past for my own Likepage, since that time we cant verifi it anymore. Its so unfair, i got almost 90K follower and wanted to use the mention app. But i cant cause of you guys :/ some other friends got just 10k Follower and they have it ? seriously ? :( sad ill not more doing paid ads, since its wasted.

replies.message: Hi Krisztina. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2ePO6aA. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2fEkE67. -Neha

you are kidding me, i was able to get a blue one. I am world known for my buisiness and as a human have over 91k follower and more, i didnt got any neither. I pay for ads! But this is over. I ll not more pay any ads more until FB is ready to do it done what they gave me the choice before.  now i have to pray for it ? then pray for my money in the future.
i mean a friend of me have 10k people, is JUST a Photographer, and have the blue one ? A normal person which is not famous ? and he got it ? Kidding me... i wont do anything more.
can you cry any less you're waking the baby. You're stressing out over pixels on a computer screen

Facebook ........I have filed 3 repair/support request and all I get is a note saying .Thank you we will use this info to improve facebook............really????????  I am not trying to improve you money maker,, I just want my dang page fixed or someone to tell me how to fix it!!!!!!!!!!  PLEASEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!
